categories.name: Appetizers
categories.description: Start your meal with our delicious appetizers

items.name: Bruschetta Trio
items.description: Three varieties: classic tomato basil, roasted red pepper, and olive tapenade

items.name: Crispy Calamari
items.description: Golden fried squid rings served with marinara sauce and lemon aioli

items.name: Spinach & Artichoke Dip
items.description: Creamy blend of spinach, artichokes, and three cheeses, served with tortilla chips

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Choice of buffalo, BBQ, or honey garlic. Served with celery sticks and blue cheese

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Button mushrooms filled with herbed cream cheese and breadcrumbs

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and classic Caesar dressing

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Mixed greens with feta cheese, olives, tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onion with Greek vinaigrette

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, carrots, cucumbers, and your choice of dressing

items.name: Cobb Salad
items.description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, and blue cheese

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce

items.name: Ribeye Steak
items.description: 12oz prime ribeye cooked to your preference, served with garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables

items.name: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella, served over pasta

items.name: Beef Burger
items.description: 8oz angus beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and your choice of cheese on a brioche bun

items.name: Pasta Carbonara
items.description: Creamy pasta with bacon, parmesan cheese, and fresh herbs

items.name: Vegetarian Risotto
items.description: Creamy arborio rice with seasonal vegetables, parmesan, and fresh herbs

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream

items.name: New York Cheesecake
items.description: Classic creamy cheesecake with berry compote

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Traditional Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone

items.name: Crème Brûlée
items.description: Vanilla custard with caramelized sugar top

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.description: Three scoops of vanilla ice cream with hot fudge, whipped cream, and a cherry

categories.name: Beverages
categories.description: Refreshing drinks to complement your meal

items.name: Fresh Lemonade
items.description: House-made lemonade with fresh lemons

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Freshly brewed iced tea, sweetened or unsweetened

items.name: Fresh Orange Juice
items.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice

items.name: Coffee
items.description: Freshly brewed coffee, regular or decaf

items.name: Espresso
items.description: Single or double shot of espresso

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam

items.name: Soft Drinks
items.description: Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta, or Root Beer
